# bevel

**Type Property**

Specifies a bevel line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.

## Declaration

```swift
static let bevel: CAShapeLayerLineJoin
```

## Constants

- **miter**: Specifies a miter line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.
- **round**: Specifies a round line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.

items.description: Specifies a miter line shape of the joints between connected segments of a stroked path.
